title: Bug Lifecycle Management
description: Tracks the lifecycle of all reported bugs from discovery to resolution.

items.description: A reference to a bug artifact. It acts as a pointer in the manifest to the actual bug report file.

status.description: The current high-level status of the bug.

summary.description: A brief, one-line summary of the bug's nature.

path.description: The relative file path to the bug's detailed markdown report from the `core-system` root.
